allItems.title: Unrush
allItems.description: A web app that helps busy minds reset in minutes with quotes and the meditation timer.

allItems.title: WebP for Quick Look
allItems.description: Quick Look extension for macOS that allows you to preview animated WebP images at original speed.

allItems.title: Redirect Web
allItems.description: Browser extension for iOS and macOS that allows you to redirect from a specific URL to wherever you want to jump.

allItems.contentHtml:
This is a Safari extension that translates the current tab or selected text.

You can get this extension from the above App Store link or Releases on Github.

Privacy Policy

Translate Web for Safari does not collect your personal information.

Personal information is information or an opinion about an identified individual or an individual who is reasonably identifiable.
allItems.title: Translate Web for Safari
allItems.description: Safari extension that translates the current tab or selected text.
